mapper.select: /* getUrbanGroup */ SELECT A.*, ST_X(A.location) AS longitude, ST_Y(A.location) AS latitude, CASE WHEN parent > 0 THEN ( SELECT urban_group_name FROM urban_group WHERE urban_group_id = A.parent ) ELSE null END AS parentName FROM urban_group A WHERE urban_group_id = #{urbanGroupId}
SELECT A.*, ST_X(A.location) AS longitude, ST_Y(A.location) AS latitude FROM urban_group A WHERE A.depth = #{depth} ORDER BY A.view_order
